TEXT_DICT.GiveCard: Spawn standard card reward when challenges spawn.
TEXT_DICT.PlayerTips: Show Opt-In Challenge descriptions when hovering the player.

TEXT_DICT.bigNoDrawCR: Big card reward with no Draw cards
TEXT_DICT.anyWeakOrVulnCR: Weak or Vulnerable card reward (any color)

TEXT_DICT.title: Challenges
TEXT_DICT.body: Challenges are occasional in-combat goals to achieve for extra rewards.

TEXT: Select a card to increase the damage of

TEXT_DICT.FullText: Increase damage of a card by %d

TEXT: Select a card to increase the Block of

TEXT_DICT.FullText: Increase Block of a card by %d

TEXT: Right-click to cycle between card colors.

TEXT_DICT.desc: End the combat within %d turns.
TEXT_DICT.name: Rush

TEXT_DICT.desc: At the start of combat, shuffle %d Slimed into your draw pile.
TEXT_DICT.name: Slime Bath

TEXT_DICT.desc: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, take %d damage.
TEXT_DICT.name: Masochistic Nature

TEXT_DICT.desc: At the end of turn %d, take %d damage.
TEXT_DICT.name: Doom Calendar

TEXT_DICT.desc: Kill more than 1 enemy in a single turn.
TEXT_DICT.name: M-M-Multi-Kill

TEXT_DICT.desc: Do not play a Power.
TEXT_DICT.name: Powerless

TEXT_DICT.desc: Do not play Strike or Defend.
TEXT_DICT.name: Not So Basic

TEXT_DICT.desc: Whenever you play a Skill, ALL enemies gain %d Strength.
TEXT_DICT.name: Nob Like This

TEXT_DICT.desc: The first card you play each turn is exhausted.
TEXT_DICT.name: Creeping Exhaustion

TEXT_DICT.desc: Each turn, whenever you draw a card beyond the %s, take %d damage at the end of your turn.
TEXT_DICT.name: Card Sharp

TEXT_DICT.desc: Whenever you kill an enemy, take %d damage.
TEXT_DICT.name: Corpse Explosion

TEXT_DICT.desc: Do not play the same card type in a row per turn.
TEXT_DICT.name: Dance Baby Dance

TEXT_DICT.desc: Drink a potion.
TEXT_DICT.name: Potionholic

TEXT_DICT.desc: Discard a potion.
TEXT_DICT.name: Potionholics Anonymous

TEXT_DICT.desc: At the end of the monsters' turn, your leftover Block gets transferred to a random enemy.
TEXT_DICT.name: Team Fortress

TEXT_DICT.desc: Whenever you play a card, ALL enemies gain %d Block.
TEXT_DICT.name: Seeing Double

TEXT_DICT.desc: Perfectly break an enemy's Block.
TEXT_DICT.name: Breakthrough

TEXT_DICT.desc: Whenever you draw a Curse or Status, add a copy of it into your discard pile.
TEXT_DICT.name: Cursed Draw

TEXT_DICT.desc: Do not attack enemies that don't intend to attack.
TEXT_DICT.name: Pacifist

TEXT_DICT.desc: You cannot play more than %d cards per turn.
TEXT_DICT.name: Strikeout

TEXT_DICT.desc: At the start of combat, shuffle a copy of every base game Status into your draw pile.
TEXT_DICT.name: Heart Ache

TEXT_DICT.desc: At the end of every %s round, ALL enemies heal for %d%% of their max HP.
TEXT_DICT.name: Time Heals All Wounds

TEXT_DICT.desc: Do not play cards that are of uncommon or rare rarity.
TEXT_DICT.name: Common Trash

TEXT_DICT.desc: Whenever you lose HP, lose %d%% of your current Gold.
TEXT_DICT.name: Mercantile

TEXT_DICT.desc: Deal more than %d unblocked attack damage with all attacks this combat.
TEXT_DICT.name: Unga Bunga

TEXT_DICT.desc: Do not draw more than 7 cards a turn.
TEXT_DICT.name: Limited Draw

TEXT_DICT.desc: The last card played every turn must be a Skill.
TEXT_DICT.name: Skilled Finish

TEXT_DICT.desc: The first card played every turn must be an Attack.
TEXT_DICT.name: Aggressive Start

TEXT_DICT.desc: Activate an Opt-In Challenge.
TEXT_DICT.name: Challenge Yourself

TEXT_DICT.desc: Apply two emerald/burning elite buffs to this combat.
TEXT_DICT.name: Charged Emerald

TEXT_DICT.desc: At the end of your turn, add a Shiv to your discard pile for every card in your hand.
TEXT_DICT.name: No Shivgrets

TEXT_DICT.desc: You may only have %d cards in your hand at once.
TEXT_DICT.name: Small Hands

TEXT_DICT.desc: Play a Power, Attack and Skill in the same turn.
TEXT_DICT.name: Type Coverage

TEXT_DICT.desc: Win the battle within %d seconds.
TEXT_DICT.name: Speedrun

TEXT_DICT.desc: Whenever you draw a card, randomize its cost between %d and %d.
TEXT_DICT.name: Snecko Deck-o

TEXT: Select a card to randomize the cost of

TEXT_DICT.FullText: Randomize the cost of a card

TEXT_DICT.desc: The first card you draw each turn is transformed for the rest of combat.
TEXT_DICT.name: Chamelyon Camouflage

TEXT_DICT.desc: Whenever you draw an Attack, its damage decreases by %d.
TEXT_DICT.name: Rusting Armaments

TEXT_DICT.desc: Do not apply debuffs to any enemy.
TEXT_DICT.name: Pure Power

TEXT: Whenever you enter a non-Boss combat, challenges may spawn. The chance increases for every combat you enter without a challenge spawning. NL You can see the chance on the challenge button in the top right.

Once a challenge has spawned, you'll get to select from a list of Opt-In challenges which bring great rewards but make combat harder. NL If you wish to review your challenges for the combat, you can click on the challenge button in the top right.
